segments.text: I often see some ' new age people ' show off their various skills to handle a skateboard , which makes me wonder in awe .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Annie , you also know the ' new age people ' . I think these people must have undergone much sufferings of flesh in order to ride skillfully .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Although it is easy to ride , the condition of the road surface should also be paid attention to , such as places being put together and full of gullies . If the condition permits , it is better to be equipped with helmet , eye shades , ankle shield , knee shield and elbow shield .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: The skateboard does not pollute the air , either . It can be used as a tool to ride instead of walk .
segments.speaker: S2
